com.io7m.jcanephora.lwjgl3

Class JCGLImplementationLWJGL3

    • com.io7m.jcanephora.lwjgl3.JCGLImplementationLWJGL3

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static JCGLImplementationLWJGL3Type getInstance()
        Returns:
        A reference to the LWJGL3 implementation

      • newUnsharedContextFrom

        public JCGLContextType newUnsharedContextFrom(long context,
                                              String name)
                                       throws JCGLException,
                                              JCGLExceptionUnsupported,
                                              JCGLExceptionNonCompliant
        Description copied from interface: JCGLImplementationLWJGL3Type

        Construct a new context from the given context. The long value is a context value returned from GLFW.glfwCreateWindow(int, int, CharSequence, long, long).

        The context is assumed not to be shared with any other context. The implementation trusts that this is the case and has no way to verify otherwise.

        Specified by:
        newUnsharedContextFrom in interface JCGLImplementationLWJGL3Type
        Parameters:
        context - An existing context
        name - The name assigned to the context, for debugging purposes
        Returns:
        A new context
        Throws:
        JCGLException - On errors
        JCGLExceptionUnsupported - If the context is of a version that is not supported
        JCGLExceptionNonCompliant - If the context violates the OpenGL specification

      • newSharedContextsFrom

        public com.io7m.jfunctional.Pair<JCGLContextType,JCGLContextType> newSharedContextsFrom(long master_context,
                                                                                        String master_name,
                                                                                        long slave_context,
                                                                                        String slave_name)
                                                                                 throws JCGLException,
                                                                                        JCGLExceptionUnsupported,
                                                                                        JCGLExceptionNonCompliant
        Description copied from interface: JCGLImplementationLWJGL3Type

        Construct a new context from the given context. The long values are context values returned from GLFW.glfwCreateWindow(int, int, CharSequence, long, long).

        The pair of contexts are assumed to be shared with each other. The implementation trusts that this is the case and has no way to verify otherwise.

        On successfully returning, the master_context context will be current on the current thread.

        Specified by:
        newSharedContextsFrom in interface JCGLImplementationLWJGL3Type
        Parameters:
        master_context - An existing context
        master_name - The name assigned to the master context, for debugging purposes
        slave_context - An existing slave context
        slave_name - The name assigned to the slave context, for debugging purposes
        Returns:
        A new context
        Throws:
        JCGLException - On errors
        JCGLExceptionUnsupported - If the context is of a version that is not supported
        JCGLExceptionNonCompliant - If the context violates the OpenGL specification
